scripts.build: npm run gen-api && vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build
scripts.gen-api: rm -rf src/api-client && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_osm.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-osm --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_datosgeo.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-datosgeo --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_auth.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-auth --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_account.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-account --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./spec/schema_public.yml -g typescript-axios -o src/api-client-public --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,supportsES6=true,useSingleRequestParameter=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models
